post:
VEEBLE HOSTING


Introducing MultiVPS Linux & Windows, create and manage multiple Linux servers with just few clicks of a button!
Sign-up for Veeble's MultiVPS with unlimited bandwidth to unleash the power of superior hosting!

How it works demo video - Watch on youtube


» CREATE & DELETE VPS
You can create Servers anytime from the Client Zone using the available resources. You can also delete the Servers without any hassles.

» EASY SCALING
You can easily scale the resources of the Server anytime from your Client Zone.

» ANYBODY CAN DO IT
No advanced technical knowledge needed for server creation/deletion. Free Basic Management included in all servers.

» LINUX & WINDOWS
You can deploy VPS with both Linux and Windows Operating Systems readily available in the control panel. There are no separate license charges for Windows Operating Systems.
